item.title: Text Classification with Hierarchical Attention Network
item.description: Text Classification with Hierarchical Attention Networks How to assign documents to classes or topics Authors: Maria Kr√§nkel, Hee-Eun Lee - Seminar Information System 18⁄19 After reading this blog post, you will know: What text classification is and what it is used for What hierarchical attention networks are and how their architecture looks like How to classify documents by implementing a hierarchical attention network Introduction Imagine you work for a company that sells cameras and you would like to find out what customers think about the latest release.
